commit.title: [ide] Move common protocol library to its own folder/object.
commit.message:
[ide] Move common protocol library to its own folder/object.

The `ide` folder contains two different binaries, the language server
`coqidetop` and `coqide` itself.

These binaries have only in common that they link to the protocol
files, but in the rest, they are totally unrelated.

In order to clean up the build, we move the common protocol files to
its own library `ideprotocol`.

This helps towards integrating Dune and an IDE standalone make target,
such as the one that was implemented here:
https://github.com/ejgallego/coqide-exp
